item.description:
Do you work in the Financial District? If so, please join me for a quick lunch at Legal Seafoods!

Please be 99.9% sure you can make it if you reply yes. No-shows are a no-no because I'll have a reservation. Thanks for understanding! I'll give out my cell phone # to the people who reply yes, just in case you need to cancel at the last minute.

Please check out their website:

http://www.legalseafo...

Looking forward to seeing everyone again! I missed you all in January ... A rough month for me! But, I'm back ... Thanks to Tonya for adding me as an assistant!

UPDATE: I made a reservation for 4 people and I have given out my cell phone # to the people who have replied yes. If there is anyone who wants to join us now, you'll need to email me and get a response back from me. I'll see if the restaurant can add another seat.

Cheers!

Lisa

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Afternoon Lunch!
